name: FF4 Minimal Tabs - Expandable faviconized tabs v2
description:
1. Shrink all tabs to show just their favicon
2. Expand tabs to show title and close button on mouse over

*tested with Firefox 4 but may work on other versions

Recommended: use in combination with http://userstyles.org/styles/45794/ff4-urlbar-in-tabbar-ie9-style

See Version 1 with active tab expanded: http://userstyles.org/styles/47771/ff4-minimal-tabs-expandable-faviconized-tabs-v1

Credit: foxxyn8
